moves.1. e4: Mitford represented the Faeroe Islands, while Black [Sharif] represented Monaco.
moves.2. Nf3 Nc6 3. Bc4: The "Quiet Game" -- but not this time!
moves.3... Be7: An unorthodox response. More aggressive is 3... N-KB3, pressuring White.
moves.6. Qd5: That's why not! Sharif resigns, as mate is threatened. What move sequence did he overlook that would have neutralized the threat -- and let him play on?
